action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: A grid with five rows and six columns. The first and third rows are completely filled with X's. The second and fourth rows have two X's in the first column, and the rest of the cells are filled with a symbol that looks like a square with a dot in the center. The fifth row has three X's in the first column, and the rest of the cells are filled with the same symbol as the second and fourth rows.
continue
